code: public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     try {         validator.process(exchange).         template.send("mock:valid", exchange).     } catch (ValidationException e) {         template.send("mock:invalid", exchange).     } }

public void configure() {     from("direct:start").process(new Processor() {          public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {             try {                 validator.process(exchange).                 template.send("mock:valid", exchange).             } catch (ValidationException e) {                 template.send("mock:invalid", exchange).             }         }     }). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:start").process(new Processor() {                  public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {                     try {                         validator.process(exchange).                         template.send("mock:valid", exchange).                     } catch (ValidationException e) {                         template.send("mock:invalid", exchange).                     }                 }             }).         }     }. }
